module.name: syshelpers
module.short: Type helpers for customizable boolean, binary and hexadecimal string representation.
module.descr: Convert boolean value to string, and ordinary value to binary or hexadecimal string using localized custom formatting.

element.name: TStringCaseFormat
element.short: Used as letters case option in conversion to strings.

element.name: TStringCaseFormat.scfUnchangedCase
element.short: Option to leave case as it is in result string during conversion.

element.name: TStringCaseFormat.scfLowerCase
element.short: Option to convert result string to lower case.

element.name: TStringCaseFormat.scfUpperCase
element.short: Option to convert result string to upper case.

element.name: TBitFormatSettings
element.short: Record type holding strings for boolean to string conversion.

element.name: TBitFormatSettings.BitTrueString
element.short: String used for boolean TRUE value.
element.descr: Default value is 'True'.

element.name: TBitFormatSettings.BitFalseString
element.short: String used for boolean FALSE value.
element.descr: Default value is 'False'.

element.name: TBitFormatSettings.BitOnString
element.short: String used for boolean ON value.
element.descr: Default value is 'On'.

element.name: TBitFormatSettings.BitOffString
element.short: String used for boolean OFF value.
element.descr: Default value is 'Off'.

element.name: TBitFormatSettings.BitOneString
element.short: String used for boolean ONE value.
element.descr: Default value is '1'.

element.name: TBitFormatSettings.BitZeroString
element.short: String used for boolean ZERO value.
element.descr: Default value is '0'.

element.name: TBitFormatSettings.Initialize(TBitFormatSettings)
element.short: Populate record with default values.
element.descr: After instance creation record strings are populated with 'True' 'False', 'On' 'Off' and '1' '0' default values.

element.name: TBitFormatSettings.CopyToDefaultBoolStrings
element.short: Changes default boolean to string text outputs in sysutils.
element.descr: Strings from the record are copied to TrueBoolStrs[] and FalseBoolStrs[] in sysutils, so all boolean to string conversion functions in sysutils will use theose new strings. For example SomeBooleanValue.ToString, BoolToStr(SomeBooleanValue, true) and TryStrToBool(SomeTrueOrFalseStr, SomeBoolOutVar). Beware that by default in console mode functions UpperCase() and LowerCase() work only for ASCII strings. Consequence is that TryStrToBool() which internally uses UpperCase() might fail when used on unicode boolean strings. This means that if you put unicode string 'Истина' into DefaultBitFormatSettings.BitTrueString, result of TryStrToBool('ИСТИна', SomeBoolOutVar) will be false in console application and true (which is expected) in LCL (GUI) application. There is no such issue in LCL (GUI) applications since UpperCase() used there does a proper unicode conversion.

element.name: TBitFormatSettings.CopyToDefaultBitFormatSettings
element.short: Changes default boolean to string text outputs in syshelpers.
element.descr: Record is copied to DefaultBitFormatSettings and all boolean to string conversion functions in syshelpers will use those new strings.

element.name: TBinFormatSettings
element.short: Record type holding strings used for ordinal to binary string conversion.

element.name: TBinFormatSettings.BinPrefixString
element.short: Prefix string at the beginning of binary string representation.

element.name: TBinFormatSettings.BinSufixString
element.short: Sufix string at the end of binary string representation.

element.name: TBinFormatSettings.BinNibbleSeparator
element.short: Separator string between nibbles (half bytes) in binary string representation.

element.name: TBinFormatSettings.BinByteSeparator
element.short: Separator string between bytes in binary string representation.

element.name: TBinFormatSettings.BinWordSeparator
element.short: Separator string between words in binary string representation.

element.name: TBinFormatSettings.BinDwordSeparator
element.short: Separator string between double words in binary string representation.

element.name: TBinFormatSettings.Initialize(TBinFormatSettings)
element.short: Populate record with default values.
element.descr: After instance creation record strings are populated with default empty values.

element.name: TBinFormatSettings.CopyToDefaultBinFormatSettings
element.short: Changes default ordinal to binary string text outputs in syshelpers.
element.descr: Record is copied to DefaultBinFormatSettings and all ordinal to binary string conversion functions in syshelpers will use those new strings.

element.name: THexFormatSettings
element.short: Record type holding strings used for ordinal to hexadecimal string conversion.

element.name: THexFormatSettings.HexPrefixString
element.short: Prefix string at the beginning of hexadecimal string representation.

element.name: THexFormatSettings.HexSufixString
element.short: Sufix string at the end of hexadecimal string representation.

element.name: THexFormatSettings.HexNibbleSeparator
element.short: Separator string between nibbles (half bytes) in hexadecimal string representation.

element.name: THexFormatSettings.HexByteSeparator
element.short: Separator string between bytes in hexadecimal string representation.

element.name: THexFormatSettings.HexWordSeparator
element.short: Separator string between words in hexadecimal string representation.

element.name: THexFormatSettings.HexDwordSeparator
element.short: Separator string between double words in hexadecimal string representation.

element.name: THexFormatSettings.Initialize(THexFormatSettings)
element.short: Populate record with default values.
element.descr: After instance creation record strings are populated with default empty values.

element.name: THexFormatSettings.CopyToDefaultHexFormatSettings
element.short: Changes default ordinal to hexadecimal string text outputs in syshelpers.
element.descr: Record is copied to DefaultHexFormatSettings and all ordinal to hexadecimal string conversion functions in syshelpers will use those new strings.

element.name: DefaultBitFormatSettings
element.short: Global boolean to string conversion defaults.

element.name: DefaultBinFormatSettings
element.short: Global ordinal to binary string conversion defaults.

element.name: DefaultHexFormatSettings
element.short: Global ordinal to hexadecimal string conversion defaults.

element.name: BitOnString
element.short: Global boolean to ON conversion string.
element.descr: Shortcut for DefaultBitFormatSettings.BitOnString. Default value is 'On'. Used in ToOnOffString() helper functions for boolean representation.

element.name: BitOffString
element.short: Global boolean to OFF conversion string.
element.descr: Shortcut for DefaultBitFormatSettings.BitOffString. Default value is 'Off'. Used in ToOnOffString() helper functions for boolean representation.

element.name: BitTrueString
element.short: Global boolean to TRUE conversion string.
element.descr: Shortcut for DefaultBitFormatSettings.BitTrueString. Default value is 'True'. Used in ToString() helper functions for boolean representation. Used in ToTrueFalseString() helper functions for boolean representation.

element.name: BitFalseString
element.short: Global boolean to FALSE conversion string.
element.descr: Shortcut for DefaultBitFormatSettings.BitFalseString. Default value is 'False'. Used in ToString() helper functions for boolean representation. Used in ToTrueFalseString() helper functions for boolean representation.

element.name: BitOneString
element.short: Global boolean to ONE conversion string.
element.descr: Shortcut for DefaultBitFormatSettings.BitOneString. Default value is '1'. Used in ToOneZeroString() helper functions for boolean representation. Used in ToBinString() helper functions for representation of individual bits.

element.name: BitZeroString
element.short: Global boolean to ZERO conversion string.
element.descr: Shortcut for DefaultBitFormatSettings.BitZeroString. Default value is '0'. Used in ToOneZeroString() helper functions for boolean representation. Used in ToBinString() helper functions for representation of individual bits.

element.name: BinPrefixString
element.short: Global prefix string at the beginning of binary string representation.
element.descr: Shortcut for DefaultBinFormatSettings.BinPrefixString. Default value is empty string. Used in ToBinString() helper functions for binary representation.

element.name: BinSufixString
element.short: Global sufix string at the end of binary string representation.
element.descr: Shortcut for DefaultBinFormatSettings.BinSufixString. Default value is empty string. Used in ToBinString() helper functions for binary representation.

element.name: BinNibbleSeparator
element.short: Global separator string between nibbles (half bytes) in binary string representation.
element.descr: Shortcut for DefaultBinFormatSettings.BinNibbleSeparator. Default value is empty string. Used in ToBinString() helper functions for binary representation.

element.name: BinByteSeparator
element.short: Global separator string between bytes in binary string representation.
element.descr: Shortcut for DefaultBinFormatSettings.BinByteSeparator. Default value is empty string. Used in ToBinString() helper functions for binary representation.

element.name: BinWordSeparator
element.short: Global separator string between words in binary string representation.
element.descr: Shortcut for DefaultBinFormatSettings.BinWordSeparator. Default value is empty string. Used in ToBinString() helper functions for binary representation.

element.name: BinDwordSeparator
element.short: Global separator string between double words in binary string representation.
element.descr: Shortcut for DefaultBinFormatSettings.BinDWordSeparator. Default value is empty string. Used in ToBinString() helper functions for binary representation.

element.name: HexPrefixString
element.short: Global prefix string at the beginning of hexadecimal string representation.
element.descr: Shortcut for DefaultHexFormatSettings.HexPrefixString. Default value is empty string. Used in ToHexString() helper functions for hexadecimal representation.

element.name: HexSufixString
element.short: Global sufix string at the end of hexadecimal string representation.
element.descr: Shortcut for DefaultHexFormatSettings.HexSufixString. Default value is empty string. Used in ToHexString() helper functions for hexadecimal representation.

element.name: HexNibbleSeparator
element.short: Global separator string between nibbles (half bytes) in hexadecimal string representation.
element.descr: Shortcut for DefaultHexFormatSettings.HexNibbleSeparator. Default value is empty string. Used in ToHexString() helper functions for hexadecimal representation.

element.name: HexByteSeparator
element.short: Global separator string between bytes in hexadecimal string representation.
element.descr: Shortcut for DefaultHexFormatSettings.HexByteSeparator. Default value is empty string. Used in ToHexString() helper functions for hexadecimal representation.

element.name: HexWordSeparator
element.short: Global separator string between words in hexadecimal string representation.
element.descr: Shortcut for DefaultHexFormatSettings.HexWordSeparator. Default value is empty string. Used in ToHexString() helper functions for hexadecimal representation.

element.name: HexDwordSeparator
element.short: Global separator string between double words in hexadecimal string representation.
element.descr: Shortcut for DefaultHexFormatSettings.HexDwordSeparator. Default value is empty string. Used in ToHexString() helper functions for hexadecimal representation.

element.name: TByteSysHelper
element.short: Byte type helper for customizable binary and hexadecimal string representation.
element.descr: Convert Byte type value to binary or hexadecimal string using localized custom formatting.

element.name: TByteSysHelper.ToBinString
element.short: Byte type helper method for customizable binary string representation.
element.descr: Convert Byte type value to binary string using localized custom formatting. TBooleanSysHelper.ToOneZeroString method is used for conversion of individual bits.

element.name: TByteSysHelper.ToBinString.Result
element.short: Binary output string.

element.name: TByteSysHelper.ToBinString.aBinFormatSettings
element.short: Record containing custom strings needed for conversion to binary string.

element.name: TByteSysHelper.ToBinString.aShowLeadingZeros
element.short: Should leading zeros be shown or not in output string.

element.name: TByteSysHelper.ToBinString.aMinDigits
element.short: Minimal number of binary digits to show in output string.

element.name: TByteSysHelper.ToHexString
element.short: Byte type helper method for customizable hexadecimal string representation.
element.descr: Convert Byte type value to hexadecimal string using localized custom formatting.

element.name: TByteSysHelper.ToHexString.Result
element.short: Hexadecimal output string.

element.name: TByteSysHelper.ToHexString.aHexFormatSettings
element.short: Record containing custom strings needed for conversion to hexadecimal string.

element.name: TByteSysHelper.ToHexString.aShowLeadingZeros
element.short: Should leading zeros be shown or not in output string.

element.name: TByteSysHelper.ToHexString.aMinDigits
element.short: Minimal number of hexadecimal digits to show in output string.

element.name: TShortIntSysHelper.ToHexString.aMinDigits
element.short: Minimal number of hexadecimal digits to show in output string.

element.name: TBooleanSysHelper
element.short: Boolean type helper for customizable boolean string representation.
element.descr: Convert Boolean type value to string using localized custom formatting.

element.name: TBooleanSysHelper.ToString
element.short: Boolean type helper for customizable boolean string representation.
element.descr: Convert Boolean type value to string using localized custom formatting.

element.name: TBooleanSysHelper.ToString.Result
element.short: Helper function result string.

element.name: TBooleanSysHelper.ToString.aValue
element.short: Boolean value that will be converted to string.

element.name: TBooleanSysHelper.ToString.aTrueStr
element.short: Custom string used for representation of boolean TRUE state.

element.name: TBooleanSysHelper.ToString.aFalseStr
element.short: Custom string used for representation of boolean FALSE state.

element.name: TBooleanSysHelper.ToString.aCharsCase
element.short: Optional string casing.
element.descr: Default value is scfUnchangedCase.

element.name: TBooleanSysHelper.ToString.aBitFormatSettings
element.short: Record holding custom strings for boolean to string conversion.

element.name: TBooleanSysHelper.ToTrueFalseString
element.short: Boolean type helper for customizable boolean string representation.
element.descr: DefaultBitFormatSettings.BitTrueString is used for representation of boolean TRUE state. DefaultBitFormatSettings.BitFalseString is used for representation of boolean FALSE state.

element.name: TBooleanSysHelper.ToTrueFalseString.Result
element.short: Helper function result string.

element.name: TBooleanSysHelper.ToTrueFalseString.aCharsCase
element.short: Optional string casing.
element.descr: Default value is scfUnchangedCase.

element.name: TBooleanSysHelper.ToOnOffString
element.short: Boolean type helper for customizable boolean string representation.
element.descr: DefaultBitFormatSettings.BitOnString is used for representation of boolean TRUE state. DefaultBitFormatSettings.BitOffString is used for representation of boolean FALSE state.

element.name: TBooleanSysHelper.ToOnOffString.Result
element.short: Helper function result string.

element.name: TBooleanSysHelper.ToOnOffString.aCharsCase
element.short: Optional string casing.

element.name: TBooleanSysHelper.ToOneZeroString

element.short: Optional string casing.
element.descr: Default value is scfUnchangedCase.
